## LinearCardContainer.insertRange() method

Add a wad of cards to the given place in this container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
insertRange(index: number, cards: TCard[] | Iterable<TCard>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | Where to insert the cards, starting at 0. |
|  cards | TCard\[\] \| Iterable&lt;TCard&gt; | Cards to add. |

**Returns:**

void
